00036 #ifndef PPPDEBUG_H
00037 #define PPPDEBUG_H
00038 
00039 /************************
00040 *** PUBLIC DATA TYPES ***
00041 ************************/
00042 /* Trace levels. */
00043 typedef enum {
00044         LOG_CRITICAL = 0,
00045         LOG_ERR = 1,
00046         LOG_NOTICE = 2,
00047         LOG_WARNING = 3,
00048         LOG_INFO = 5,
00049         LOG_DETAIL = 6,
00050         LOG_DEBUG = 7
00051 } LogCodes;
00052 
00053 
00054 /***********************
00055 *** PUBLIC FUNCTIONS ***
00056 ***********************/
00057 /*
00058  *      ppp_trace - a form of printf to send tracing information to stderr
00059  */
00060 void ppp_trace(int level, const char *format,...);
00061 
00062 #if PPP_DEBUG > 0
00063 
00064 #define AUTHDEBUG(a) ppp_trace##a
00065 #define IPCPDEBUG(a) ppp_trace##a
00066 #define UPAPDEBUG(a) ppp_trace##a
00067 #define LCPDEBUG(a) ppp_trace##a
00068 #define FSMDEBUG(a) ppp_trace##a
00069 #define CHAPDEBUG(a) ppp_trace##a
00070 
00071 #define PPPDEBUG(a) ppp_trace##a
00072 
00073 #define TRACELCP 1
00074 
00075 #else
00076 
00077 #define AUTHDEBUG(a)
00078 #define IPCPDEBUG(a)
00079 #define UPAPDEBUG(a)
00080 #define LCPDEBUG(a)
00081 #define FSMDEBUG(a)
00082 #define CHAPDEBUG(a)
00083 
00084 #define PPPDEBUG(a)
00085 
00086 #define TRACELCP 0
00087 
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 #endif /* PPPDEBUG_H */
